subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In the latest miserable moment in an increasingly discouraging season, Scott Schoeneweis gave up a home run in extra innings that tarnished the Mets’ exciting ninth-inning comeback.
snippet: In the latest miserable moment in an increasingly discouraging season, Scott Schoeneweis gave up a home run in extra innings that tarnished the Mets’ exciting ninth-inning comeback.
